participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a strong desire to help others.
participant_1.background: I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets. I am studying to be a special education teacher. I am from Georgia. I love the cold weather and enjoy living in rural Wisconsin. I like to make clothes.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and artistic, with a heart for family and creativity.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active. I enjoy making things for my family. I find it important that my partner is trustworthy and supportive. My car is pink. I love to act out my characters with my friends.

content.text: I just moved to Wisconsin and I love the cold weather!
Hi there! Welcome to Wisconsin, I'm glad to hear you're enjoying the cold weather! What brought you to Wisconsin?
I'm going to be studying to be a special education teacher at the university of wisconsin.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clothes, go swimming, and spend time with my family.
I love to make things for my family too! I also enjoy swimming and acting out characters with my friends.
That's great! What kind of things do you like to make?
I like to make jewelry, clothes, and crafts.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to make jewelry.
It's really easy! There are lots of tutorials online.
Thanks! I'll have to check them out.
You're welcome! I hope you enjoy Wisconsin!
